body: Dear Chris, thank you very much for your prompt reply! However, the problem is not solved after I unblock the two files in the directory C:\Users\oat\AppData\Roaming\Ladybug\, and restart the computer. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/pYo728rS*VE75JWBlPd4s2LSksyrpMQiycw86yd-3u62hnyH1LE**o1c2kIA4tlQNWmEfpM0xSFDxrRPssXgAZiBC-Lp0clm/1.PNG) I also tried the GH unblock file created by [Marios Tsiliakos (http://www.grasshopper3d.com/profiles/blogs/unblo...](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/profile/MariosT) But I assume it only checks the LB&HB user components which don't include the two files mentioned above. Plus, I also found that the right-click menu option for unblock is not working using Marios' file... I didn't even get the windows to remind me the change of the registration key ... Anyway, I shall probably email Marios in this regard. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/pYo728rS*VHTc84pDIfom93DE8k47EVr4n-sn52EsDREP5U11CpXOibazlj652md3IG*s-ojagqoP5LlQj6OxcYEtXQxAjN1/02.PNG) I also installed multiple version of EnergyPlus in case it is related to a specific version of EP: v8.1.0, v8.2.7, v8.3.0, v8.4.0 So, I'm kind of stuck here... with all the solutions checked so far .... Please kindly advise if I shall check other things that may have caused this issue ... Thank you very much!
